'''''Minecraft: Magical Bite-Sized Builds''''' is a building tutorial book containing 20 small-scale builds.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|Add a touch of magic to your Overworld with these 20 new mini-projects in Minecraft, from mermaid lagoons and genie lamps to dragons' lairs and enchanting towers. There's even a giant magician's hat that spawns rabbits! <br><br> With illustrated step-by-steo instructions and tips throughout, this book will have you creating loads of magical builds to impress your friends with!}}
